name: Troll-Li The Snowball
description:
Meet Troll-Li; he's a snowball in a precarious position.

One day our friend Troll-Li was nestled peacefully on the mountain top of Mt. Bernidad when suddenly the wind blew him off! He rolled fiercely and landed on a single small point where he remains currently. 

It is your job to make sure that Troll-Li does not grow too big and fall off the cliff and destroy the town of New Chadswick. However, do not let him get too small or he will melt.

Click on the snowflakes to collect currency to spend at the shop. Items you buy will either grow Troll-Li or shrink him. Some items have a stronger effect than others. Be sure to exit the shop and check back for other items!
